text: Liz Bennett is an American politician, who was elected to the Iowa House of Representatives in the 2014 elections."House 65 rivals view role of state government differently". Cedar Rapids Gazette, October 18, 2016. A member of the Democratic Party, she represents the 65th district."Bias appears to be gone, but women still a minority in government". Cedar Rapids Gazette, January 5, 2016. She is the first out LGBT woman to serve in Iowa's state legislature."Iowa LGBTQ activists vow they won't be silenced". Iowa City Press-Citizen, January 12, 2017. ==Voting Record== In the 2017 legislative session, Bennett voted against a cut of $638,000 to the Department of Veterans Affairs and Iowa Veterans Home. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Members of the Iowa House of Representatives Category:Lesbian politicians Category:LGBT state legislators in Iowa Category:Women state legislators in Iowa Category:People from Cedar Rapids, Iowa Category:Iowa Democrats Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Liz Bennett
